When then Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, General Colin Powell , was asked about the number of deaths the Iraqi military suffered, he said, I don't have a clue and I don't plan to undertake any real effort to find out. This is the same man who stated several months after Desert Storm that his goal was to`` make the world scared to death of the United States.''
